{"id":849004758,"question_id":43,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1669275041,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/849004758/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public String multiply(String num1, String num2) {\n        if(\"0\".equals(num1) || \"0\".equals(num2))\n            return \"0\";\n        \n        int[] arr = new int[num1.length() + num2.length()-1]; \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<num1.length(); i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<num2.length(); j++){\n                arr[i+j] = (num1.charAt(i)-'0') * (num2.charAt(j)-'0');\n            }\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        for(int i=0; i<arr.length-1; i++){\n            arr[i+1] += arr[i]/10;\n            arr[i] = arr[i]%10;\n            \n            sb.append(arr[i]);\n        }\n        \n        sb.append(arr[arr.length-1]);\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
